General.Name: MMTC Limited
General.Description: MMTC Limited operates as a trading company in Asia, Europe, Africa, the Middle East, Latin America, and North America. It engages in the trading of agro products, including wheat, rice, maize, soya bean meal, sugar, edible oil, and pulses; coal and hydrocarbon products; precious metals, non-ferrous metals, industrial raw materials, minerals, gold, jewelry and gems, and other commodities. The company also supplies fertilizers, such as urea. In addition, it trades in coking coal; and engineering products, as well as operates a windmill project located at Gajendergarh in Karnataka. MMTC Limited was incorporated in 1963 and is based in New Delhi, India.
